headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Philip Morris’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Philip Morris delivered results ahead of Wall Street’s expectations in Q1, driven primarily by strong momentum in its smoke-free product portfolio. Management credited the rapid growth of ZYN nicotine pouches and continued expansion of IQOS heated tobacco units as key contributors, with shipment volumes up significantly year over year. The company also benefited from improved manufacturing productivity and favorable shipment timing. CFO Emmanuel Babeau noted, “Our smoke-free business now account
